text: Uye unoona zuva parinobuda richirereka kurudyi kwebako ravo, uye parinonyura, rinorereka kubva kwavari kuruboshwe, asi vakarara vari pakati pebako. Ichi chiiratidzo kubva kuzviratidzo zvaAllah. Uyo anotungamirwa naAllah, ndiye akatungamirwa; uye uyo wavanotsaudzira, kwaari hauwani shamwari yekumutungamira (kunzira yakatwasuka)
